Adele watches Brian and Carrie for a moment, then loses interest. She stands on the seat of the swing and begins swinging.
Adele swings higher. Her summer dress ripples in the wind. A smile on her face.
Adele swings even higher. She's lost in the moment. Euphoric.

Characters.Character: AT THE REAR OF THE HOUSE

Replies.Reply: Early tries to push up the kitchen window. It barely lifts three inches before jamming. Through the room we see the little girl and her father step to the front door.
We see that Early and the purse have gone.

Carrie watches Early eat with a kind of horrible, rude fascination. He has no table manners at all. He eats with his elbows on the table, fork wedged in the fist of his right hand. All the while, he chews with his mouth open. He's serious about his "eating."
Early reaches down into the bottom of the purse and pulls out a pair of glistening stainless steel scissors.
Brian struggles with the wheel and the jack.
She notices Early's wallet on the ground.
She picks up the wallet.
She opens the wallet to find two one dollar bills inside.
She lowers the camera from her eye and studies Adele.
Her eyes searching for anyone who could help.
Early's feet galloping.
A FAT MAN in his late thirties exits from behind the wheel of the Mercedes. Early watches him as he takes a money clip from his pocket and walks toward the entrance to the mini market.
He watches the Fat Man inside the office.
Still unable to get the TV to work, he smacks it a good one on the side.
Adele takes a photo of them, approaching. The attendant steps up to Carrie.
Comes to twenty eight dollars.
Hear it never rains there. Must be nice.
Walter Livesy.
Not so good. You sure you have to?
Vernon, Florida.
Turkey mostly.
No sir.
Early helps Brian to hold the gun.
When you gonna give me so o' that!
Early steps out of the bathroom and makes his way back to Brian.
What did you say to her city boy!
What's a jism gargling cum drunk fairy like you looking at a pretty girl like that for anyway?
This yur' boyfriend?
Hey Asshole!
Brian turns on the light. Takes a piss. A long one.
Early stares at Brian.
Adele watches the tiny down feather drift to the floor.
Let's take a look.
I'll call in the plate.
We got a match, I'll call for back up.
He stops at the sight of the wounded Male Officer. Shocked, he watches the man writhing in pain. His hands clutching his crotch. His blood oozes into the dirt.

He moves into the back bedroom and finds Carrie. She is crouched on the floor, handcuffed to the bedframe. He moves to help her. As he gets closer, he sees her badly bruised face and realizes what's taken place throughout the night.
Early pushes Adele out of the way.
